size.description: The multi-checkbox group size, which is only valid for checkboxes in the form of buttons or checkboxes with borders
size.description_zh: 多选框组尺寸，仅对按钮形式的 Checkbox 或带有边框的 Checkbox 有效

:min.description: The minimum number of checkboxes that can be checked
:min.description_zh: 可被勾选的 checkbox 的最小数量

:max.description: The maximum number of checkboxes that can be checked
:max.description_zh: 可被勾选的 checkbox 的最大数量

text-color.description: The color of the text when the checkbox is activated in the form of a button
text-color.description_zh: 按钮形式的 Checkbox 激活时的文本颜色

fill.description: The color of the fill and border when the checkbox in the form of a button is activated
fill.description_zh: 按钮形式的 Checkbox 激活时的填充色和边框色

events.name: change
events.description: An event that is triggered when a binding value changes
events.description_zh: 当绑定值变化时触发的事件
